game.name: Princess Halloween Dress
game.description:
Halloween has just approached and these cute princesses are finding it very difficult to wait anymore to get the awesome look for the party! Both beauties are the true fashionista, but today they look pretty confused what to put on to create the real spirit of the Halloween season. Your unmatched fashion sense has forced them to hire you as their personal stylist. Join Halloween Party and be prepared to guide them to pick up the perfect spooky outfits! You would find plenty of horror and scary outfit options in their wardrobe.

They are very happy for the Halloween party that is going to take place tonight. Browse through an extensive collection of horror outfits, hairstyles, and a pair of shoes, hats and make-up items to give them the best monster looks one by one. Start with the princess standing on the left side of the screen in this one of the best HTML5 dressing games! Give them a strapless green and orange dress with pumpkins on the bottom! Pair it with a matching hat, jewelry items, a pair of shoes and a spooky handbag on her hand!

Now move to the next princess that is standing on the right side of the screen. Dress her up with a strapless black and red long frock with an orange belt with a bat sticker! Combine her dress with a black hat with a purple note, a pair of matching earrings and a necklace, a pair of red shoes, and a red handbag with spider prints on it! Once you are done, click the next button and get ready to see the final result. Stay with us to find new Halloween games and have fun for free online without download!
